channel.title: Meta PM Interview Prep
channel.description: L7-caliber Meta PM interview prep. Product Sense and Execution deep dives with dual A/B answers for every question.
channel.itunes:author: Amanda Bradford

item.title: EP2: Product Sense Master — 17 L7 Questions (4hr 16min)
item.description: The definitive Meta PM Product Sense episode. 17 most-asked questions with dual A/B L7-caliber answers. Covers volunteering, healthcare, FB Groups, WhatsApp, fitness, travel, education, Gen Z, TikTok competition, ad-free Instagram, AI product sense, and more. Every answer demonstrates BUS, CIRCLES, KANO, 10x, 5Es, and other frameworks applied naturally.

item.title: EP1: Meta PM Interview Prep — Full Episode (All 5 Rounds)
item.description: Complete 3-hour walkthrough of Meta's PM interview. Covers both IC7 roles, 26 questions with 52 model answers. Product Sense, Execution, Project Retrospective, XFN Partnership, and Operating at Meta.
